subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds scored 22 points and Dante Cunningham had 21 to lead Villanova to a 78-75 victory over visiting Syracuse Saturday to solidify the Wildcats’ N.C.A.A. tournament credentials.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds scored 22 points and Dante Cunningham had 21 to lead Villanova to a 78-75 victory over visiting Syracuse Saturday to solidify the Wildcats’ N.C.A.A. tournament credentials.
